title: I have a Problem GD
body:
I'm generally pretty good about food. But this is one of my few weaknesses. You see that box? How there are supposed to be 30 of these little things?

http://i.imgur.com/FF2lP9f.jpg

That is the box 2 hours later. The goddamn things are just delicious. I don't even keep the box next to me; every time I wanted one I had to go downstairs to get one. I'm a slave to the eclairs!
